.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IConventionForeignKey FindSharedObjectRootForeignKey(class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IConventionForeignKey foreignKey, [in]valuetype Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.StoreObjectIdentifier& storeObject) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function FindSharedObjectRootForeignKey (foreignKey As IConventionForeignKey, ByRef storeObject As StoreObjectIdentifier) As IConventionForeignKey
static member FindSharedObjectRootForeignKey : Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IConventionForeignKey * StoreObjectIdentifier -> Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IConventionForeignKey

public static Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IConventionForeignKey? FindSharedObjectRootForeignKey (this Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IConventionForeignKey foreignKey, in Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.StoreObjectIdentifier storeObject);

Docs.param: The identifier of the containing store object.

summary.para: Finds the first that is mapped to the same constraint in a shared table-like object.
This method is typically used by database providers (and other extensions). It is generally not used in application code.

Docs.returns: The foreign key if found, or if none was found.
